column1: What do you need to remember for traction

column1: What do you need to remember for skeletal traction

column1: What to remember when doing colostomy irrigation
column2: Fill container with 500-1000 ml of tap water, hang it 12-18 inches above the waist of pt or shoulder level, put clean gloves, lubricate the cone and insert it 2-4 inches deep, irrigate for 5-10 mins only, wait for stool evacuation for 30-45 mins.
